main event: Coast Guard personnel at New Orleans observed a mushroom cloud resembling an atomic explosion in the Gulf of Mexico.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1-2 minutes., A report was made by a schooner that saw the cloud rising thousands of feet in the air., 12 aircraft were deployed to investigate but saw nothing., The investigation included visual and radar searches., The incident was deemed closed pending further information.
witness description: Coast Guard personnel and a vessel's crew
